metadata.synopsis: Guy, a well-liked parole officer, and his wife Sasha, a former model, enjoy a successful marriage until she gets the itch to go back to work. As Sasha forms a strange friendship with an emerging photographer, Guy has to deal with a parolee who proves to be more than he bargained for.

reviews: A tepid throwback to the days when video store shelves groaned beneath the weight of "Fatal Attraction" knockoffs.
